bib.title: Statistical Distributions of Parts of Speech Frequencies in Polish. Big Data Analysis
bib.author: Paw{\l}owski, Adam and Topolski, Krzysztof and Malak, Piotr and Koco{\'n}, Jan and Marci{\'n}czuk, Micha{\l}
bib.abstract: In the present paper statistical distributions of vocabulary in a big corpus of Polish and in its sub-corpora are estimated and compared. A hypothesis is tested which states that statistical distributions in the entire corpus and in its sub-corpora are different with regard to type and/or parameter values (in case of similar models). The research was carried out on the material of a balanced corpus of Polish using NLP programming tools prepared in the framework of the CLARIN-PL consortium. The results prove that only some parts of speech
bib.journal: Structure, Function and Process in Texts
